head.title: Seventh-day Adventist Church || North American Division

media_block_default.description: Family Ministries joins the Seventh-day Adventist Church's emphasis on sharing the love of Jesus and the hope of His soon return with people in some of the world's largest cities. By using the Family to Family resources each Adventist family can reach others and help them become disciples of Jesus.

media_block_default.title: Healthy Families for Eternity
media_block_default.description: The 2016 Family Ministries Planbook - World Edition is available now for download!

media_block_default.title: Now on the Hope Channel
media_block_default.description: Real Family Talk with Willie & Elaine Oliver is a weekly 30-minute TV show on The Hope Channel! Watch past episodes or find a station online!

article_header.heading: UCC Dedicates Exercise Trail to the Memory of Dr. Jay R Sloop
article_header.subheading: Church members, humanitarians gather donations to assist those affected by the tragedy.
